api_list.name: Translate
api_list.description: This endpoint translates the input text from one language to another.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://gcp-translate.p.rapidapi.com/translate"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "gcp-translate.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Detect
api_list.description: This endpoint detects the language of the input text and returns the detected language code.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://gcp-translate.p.rapidapi.com/detect"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "gcp-translate.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Languages
api_list.description: This endpoint returns a list of supported languages for translation.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://gcp-translate.p.rapidapi.com/languages"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "gcp-translate.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
